cliCommands.description: Configure the project to start tracking automatically
Link CLI to your SaaS account via API key
Manually sync local sessions to the SaaS dashboard
Display all your tracked sessions in a human-readable format
Remove tracking setup from the project

apiKeyInfoAlert.title: Authentication reminder
apiKeyInfoAlert.description: This step only needs to be done once, or each time you regenerate your API key. The API key is stored globally on your computer and used automatically by the CLI.
